Project2

Class Date

  • java.lang.Object
    • Project2.Date
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Date>

    public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Date>
    Makes a Date object from a string or today's date if given no arguments. Various getters for retrieving data, toString and compareTo method is overwritten. Includes isValid() method for date validation and isLeapYEar() helper method to assist with that.
    Author:
    Nicholas Triano, Antonio Ignarra

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Date()
      create an object with today’s date

      take a String mm/dd/yyyy and creates a Date object
